title: Finnwood Cafe at Gardens by the Bay
blurb: Enjoy a meal amidst the beauty of Gardens by the Bay.
description: Finnwood Cafe offers a delightful dining experience within the serene environment of Gardens by the Bay. The cafe provides a variety of food and beverage options, perfect for families and visitors looking to relax and refuel during their visit. Enjoy the scenic views while savoring delicious meals and snacks. The cafe is family-friendly and provides a comfortable setting for all ages. With its convenient location and diverse menu, Finnwood Cafe is an ideal spot to take a break and enjoy the surroundings. The cafe offers a range of options from light bites to full meals, ensuring there is something for everyone.
datetime_display: Operating Hours as per Gardens by the Bay
keyword_tag: Cafe, Dining, Gardens by the Bay, Family-friendly
address_display: 18 Marina Gardens Dr, #01-18 Children's Garden Cafe, Singapore 018953

title: Finnwood: Quick-Service Dining for Families
blurb: Social space for families to bond and escape to.
description: Finnwood at the Children’s Garden in Gardens by the Bay is more than just a dining space. This family-friendly, quick-service restaurant offers a space to socialize and bond. Serving a mix of local, Asian, and Western flavors at affordable prices, Finnwood features a unique “food-art” inspired children’s menu. Opening hours are Thursday to Sunday and Public Holidays from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM. During school holidays, it's open Tuesday to Sunday from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM, closed every Monday.
address_display: 18 Marina Gardens Dr, #01-18 Children's Garden Cafe, Singapore 018953

title: Finnwood Cafe: Socialising and Bonding
description: Finnwood Cafe offers a quick-service dining experience designed for families to socialise and bond. The cafe provides a casual and family-friendly atmosphere where parents and children can enjoy a meal together. The menu includes a variety of options suitable for different tastes, ensuring that everyone in the family finds something they like. The cafe aims to create a welcoming space where families can relax and create lasting memories while enjoying a meal in a comfortable setting. It is an ideal spot for a quick bite or a leisurely meal after exploring the gardens.
keyword_tag: cafe, family dining, quick service, Gardens by the Bay

title: Finnwood at the Children’s Garden
description: Finnwood at the Children’s Garden at Garden by the Bay aims to be more than just a space to dine. This family friendly quick-service restaurant is a space to socialise, a space for families to bond, a space to escape to. Serving a mouth-watering mix of local, Asian and Western flavours at affordable prices, Finnwood also features a unique and extensive “food-art” inspired children’s menu. This is a great place for families to enjoy a meal together after playing in the Children's Garden. The restaurant offers a variety of options to cater to different tastes, ensuring that everyone finds something they like. The atmosphere is relaxed and welcoming, making it an ideal spot for families with young children.
datetime_display: friendly quick-service restaurant is a space to socialise, a space for families to bond, a space to escape to

title: Finnwood Restaurant at Gardens by the Bay
blurb: Local, Asian & Western flavors at affordable prices.
description: Finnwood restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring local, Asian, and Western cuisines at affordable prices. It is known for its unique and extensive “food-art” inspired children’s menu, making it a family-friendly dining option within Gardens by the Bay. The restaurant provides a casual dining experience suitable for families and individuals looking for a variety of food choices. The ambiance is relaxed and welcoming, catering to both adults and children. The menu includes options for various dietary preferences and offers a range of dishes from appetizers to desserts. The restaurant aims to provide a pleasant dining experience for all visitors.

keyword_tag: Restaurant, Dining, Family-friendly, Asian Cuisine, Western Cuisine, Local Cuisine

title: Finnwood Souvenir Shop at Gardens by the Bay
blurb: Bring a piece of the Gardens home with souvenirs!
description: Browse a curated selection of merchandise and souvenirs to remember your visit to Gardens by the Bay. Finnwood offers a variety of items, from small trinkets to larger mementos, allowing you to take a piece of the Gardens home with you. Discover unique gifts and keepsakes that capture the essence of this iconic Singaporean attraction. Perfect for families and visitors looking to commemorate their experience.
keyword_tag: Souvenir shop, gifts, Gardens by the Bay, merchandise
